text: Ne khwenyanga khwakhabachingulile khutsio, halali bo bahandila- khushialo(okhwenya obwikhoyo nende okhwibilila mwikulu) Mana nibaloonda obwikombi bwabu. Ifwani yabu ili shinga imbwa noyikhupila oluyoka- iheesana, nenoyilekha iheesana butswa. Eyo niyo ifwani yabandu bayingasia ebimanyisio biefu, kho bakanile tsingano bakhaba bario baparamwo
